amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 110 from the bill which prohibits the Army Corps from clarifying the definition of waters under the jurisdiction of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 110, which prohibits funds to be used to enforce a rule which pertains to the definition of waters under the jurisdiction of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 237 (Roll no. 308).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 237 (Roll no. 308).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Moran.
